Honestly speaking, answer to these kind of questions are difficult, because it depends on your hardware and resources! But for maximum privacy:
1) install qubesOS https://www.qubes-os.org
2) then use Tails OS when you need privacy
3) study about TOR & how to use Tails.
4) for more information: study about TCP/IP , DeepWeb , DarkNet, ...
